content: नुद् {c6c} <ab>U.</ab> (नुदति-ते, नुत्त or नुन्न, प्रणुदते) {@--1@} To push, push or drive on, impel, propel; मंदं मंदं नुदति पवनश्चानुकूलो यथा त्वां <ls>Me. 9</ls>; <ls>U. 5. 1.</ls> {@--2@} To prompt, incite, urge on; <ls>Śi. 11. 26</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 65.</ls> {@--3@} To remove, drive away, cast away, dispel; अदस्त्वया नुन्नमनुत्तमं तमः <ls>Śi. 1. 27</ls>; केयूरबंधोच्छ्वसितैर्नुनोद <ls>R. 6. 68</ls>, <ls n="R.">8. 40</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 85</ls>; <ls>Ki. 3. 33.</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">5. 28.</ls> {@--4@} To throw, cast, send. {@--5@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To raise, lift up. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To remove, drive away. {@--2@} To prompt, incite, push on or urge forward. WITH उप to drive away, remove; <ls>Śi. 4. 61.</ls> --प्र to dispel, drive off, remove; <ls>Śi. 9. 71.</ls>
